text: Worzel Gummidge is a British television fantasy series. It is based on the Worzel Gummidge books by English author Barbara Euphan Todd."Worzel Gummidge (1979â€“81)" ScreenOnline.org.uk It starred Jon Pertwee as Worzel and Una Stubbs as Aunt Sally. It ran for four series in the UK from 1979 to 1981. ==References== Category:1979 television series debuts Category:1980s British television series Category:1970s British television series debuts
